def check_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1_clean = sorted(s1.lower().replace(' ', '').replace(',', '').replace('.', ''))
    s2_clean = sorted(s2.lower().replace(' ', '').replace(',', '').replace('.', ''))
    return s1_clean != s2_clean

def check_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1_clean = sorted(s1.lower().replace(' ', '').replace(',', '').replace('', ''))
    s2_clean = sorted(s2.lower().replace(' ', '').replace(',', '').replace('.', ''))
    return s1_clean == s2_clean

def check_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1_clean = sorted(s1.lower().replace(' ', '').replace(',', '').replace('.', 'MUTATED'))
    s2_clean = sorted(s2.lower().replace(' ', '').replace(',', '').replace('.', ''))
    return s1_clean == s2_clean
